page.title: 02MAJOR EVENTS IN SEDGEFIELD
page.content: Sedgefield has three major annual events, The Ball Game, Medieval Fair, and the Annual Show. The Ball Game has been going for about nine hundred years.It takes place on Shrove Tuesday.The object is to keep the ball for up to 3hrs.At the start you pass the ball through the ring on the village green and try to keep the ball. After three hours you take the ball back to the bull ring and pass it through three times to win. The Medieval Fair started in nineteen seventy seven.Money raised goes to the Community Association to pay for repairs to roads, electric,water, and other improvements inside Ceddesfeld Hall the Associations building. Stalls on Medieval Fair day are raffles, shows,floats on parade,the ducking stall and jousting.
